subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Justin Blackmon was arrested on Sunday after authorities in Stillwater, Okla., said he had three times the legal limit of alcohol in his system when he was pulled over shortly after 3 a.m.
snippet: Justin Blackmon was arrested on Sunday after authorities in Stillwater, Okla., said he had three times the legal limit of alcohol in his system when he was pulled over shortly after 3 a.m.
